column2: There is no international agreement as to the separate definition of lignite and brown coal. In some cases they are distinguished. Elsewhere both may be aggregated under one or other term
Where no sub-commodity is shown the figures relate to all ranks of coal.
Data for coking coal is not always distinguished from other types of bituminous coal. The term "bituminous" in this table may include coking coal where the latter is not separately shown.
Where no sub-commodity is shown the figures relate to all ranks of coal.
Years ended 20 March following that stated
Spitzbergen: not including production from mines controlled by Russia
Including beneficiated and directly shipped material
Years ended 31 March following that stated
Years ended 30 June of that stated
Includes a small amount of refuse recovery
Years ended 15 July of that shown
May also include other types of coal
